data.name: کشمون
data.description: Keshmoon is a fast growing and purpose driven startup. Keshmoon enables socially conscious consumers to buy high quality and fresh saffron directly from farmers in South Khorasan using an online platform. As such, farmers gain from their valuable products will increase, which leads to an improved quality of life for their families and a stronger motivation to use water efficient methods to farm and grow saffron.
